snippet: The Andy Warhol Foundation for the Visual Arts, working with Incase, has borrowed the graphics from one of Warhol's most famous works, the sculpture Brillo Boxes, to make covers for the MacBook, iPad and iPhone 4S. It's the sixth in the foundation's...
abstract: The Andy Warhol Foundation for the Visual Arts, working with Incase, has borrowed the graphics from one of Warhol's most famous works, the sculpture Brillo Boxes, to make covers for the MacBook, iPad and iPhone 4S. It's the sixth in the foundation's Warhol series.

headline.main: Warhol Has Your Mac Products Covered
headline.print_headline: Warhol Foundation Provides Graphics for Product Covers
